title: Benefits and disability: 'I'll never cohabit again, to protect myself'
description: Some disabled people have been left uncomfortably reliant on partners after benefits were removed.

title: Letter from Africa: Lamenting the Algeria-Morocco border closure
description: The Morocco-Algeria border has been closed for decades, despite close ties between the people.

title: Escaping a serial killer - and moving on
description: Kara Chamberlain was kidnapped when she was 15. Now she talks about her trauma on social media.

title: Where is the anti-lockdown movement headed?
description: What is set to become of the growing anti-lockdown movement once Covid restrictions are lifted?

title: UFOs: 'These objects show physics we don't understand'
description: An astronautical engineering expert on the unanswered questions in the US government's UFO report.

title: Olympic hopeful spent lockdown training 'in a makeshift pool'
description: Record-breaking 17-year-old Evie Davis from Bromley has set her sights on swimming at the Olympics in Paris.

title: Is the use of jetpacks finally about to take off?
description: Members of the public can now pay to fly through the air like a superhero.

title: After Lod violence, Israeli city's residents fear for the future
description: Both Jewish and Arab Israelis feel unprotected after intercommunal violence in the Israeli city.

title: Brexit: Exporting my fish to China is easier than to France
description: A Scottish fisherman says post-Brexit rules means three hours worth of paperwork for each EU order.

title: Protests, pet thefts and sex crimes: MPs want changes to the policing bill
description: The controversial Policing, Crime, Sentencing and Courts bill is back in the Commons on Monday.

title: Wildcard Raducanu to headline Court One on day seven of Wimbledon
description: British wildcard Emma Raducanu headlines a mouth-watering day of fourth-round singles action on the show courts on day seven of Wimbledon.

title: Homeowners to get 15 years to sue for bad workmanship - minister
description: The announcement comes amid concerns leaseholders are bearing the cost of fire safety works.

title: Philippines military plane crash kills at least 29 but dozens survive
description: Dozens of those on board are pulled from the burning wreckage on the southern island of Jolo.

title: Covid-19: Masks will become personal choice, says Robert Jenrick
description: England will move into a period without legal restrictions as measures ease, Robert Jenrick says.

title: Cyprus appeals for help as deadly wildfire rips through forest
description: Four missing people are confirmed dead as a huge blaze forces the evacuation of several villages.

title: Don't allow shop abuse to worsen, retail bosses urge PM
description: Retailers say the situation got worse during the pandemic and they want better legal protection for workers.

title: Firms urge PM to back returning to the office
description: Working from home should no longer be the default after 19 July, say more than 50 business leaders.

title: Euro 2020: 'My message to the England team - enjoy every minute of moments like this' - Alan Shearer
description: Former England captain and BBC Sport columnist Alan Shearer says the nation is behind the Three Lions, and their players should try to take everything in before Wednesday's Euro 2020 semi-final against Denmark.

title: Euro 2020: England win over Ukraine most-watched live TV event of the year with 20.9m peak
description: England's 4-0 victory over Ukraine at Euro 2020 attracts a peak TV audience of 20.9m, making it the most-watched live TV event of the year with 81.8% audience share.

title: Memorial for Sgt Matiu Ratana: Rugby club's unsung hero
description: Sgt Matiu Ratana, head coach at East Grinstead Rugby Club, was "a role model, mentor and friend".

title: Pandemic investing: 'Using my part-time pay to invest in stocks'
description: Interest in investing and trading grew during the Covid pandemic, but experts warn of the risks.

title: England focus turns to Denmark semi-final after thrashing Ukraine
description: England will face Denmark in the Euro 2020 semi-finals on Wednesday, but what is the latest with tickets and how many will be able to watch at Wembley?

title: The Papers: Mask laws 'to be axed', and 'Lions roar in Rome'
description: Sunday's papers look ahead to lockdown lifting in England on 19 July, and celebrate the football win.

title: Miami building collapse: Search efforts suspended ahead of demolition
description: Teams are preparing to raze the standing portion of an apartment building that collapsed last week.

title: Archaeologists dig in over planning reforms row
description: Experts warn history and heritage could be lost if they are excluded from the government's new plans.
